column1: U.S. total energy consumption by energy end-use sector, 1950-2023
Data source: U.S. Energy Information Administration, Monthly Energy Review, Table 2.1, April 2024, preliminary data for 2023
Note: Total energy consumption includes primary energy and electrical energy; electrical energy includes electric system energy losses.
An interactive area flow chart showing historical U.S. annual total energy consumption by energy end-use sector in 1950 through 2023.
